Description: It is simple to start making your bot via @BotFather and BB
text: Open Telegram, search for @BotFather, tap **Start**, then send the command **/newbot**
When BotFather asks “Alright, a new bot. How are we going to call it?”, reply with a friendly display name, e.g. **My First BB Bot**.
BotFather now asks for a username ending in **bot**. Provide a unique username such as **myfirstbb_bot**.
BotFather responds with your **HTTP API token**—a long string of letters and numbers. **Copy it.**

Open BB App -> new Bot, fill token and start bot!

Done! Your bot is started
Open your Bot and make command with name /start
Open command and fill in answer: "Hello from bot"

Go to bot and run /start or press "Start" button. You will have text from bot!

Also please see this video about all command's options
